content.query:
-- reading data from subfolder way-1
use nyc_taxi_discovery;
SELECT
    top 5 *  
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.*',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
--reading multiple folders in bulk synatx :
SELECT  result.filename() as file_name,count(*) as records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.*',
        'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/month=01/*.*')
    ,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
group by result.filename()
order by result.filename();
-- reading data from subfolders way-2
SELECT
    count(1) as records 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_data_green_csv/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
---filename()
SELECT 
    result.filename() as file_name,count(*) as records
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_data_green_csv/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
group by result.filename()
order by result.filename() desc
;

--taking only 2020 jan and 2021 jan 
SELECT 
    result.filename() as file_name,count(*) as records
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_data_green_csv/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where result.filename() in('green_tripdata_2021-01.csv','green_tripdata_2020-01.csv')
group by result.filename()
order by result.filename() desc
;

--filepath()
SELECT 
    result.filename() as file_name,result.filepath() as file_path,count(*) as records
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/**',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
--where result.filename() in('green_tripdata_2021-01.csv','green_tripdata_2020-01.csv')
group by result.filename(),result.filepath()
order by result.filename() desc,result.filepath() desc
;

---using wildcards under filepath()
SELECT 
    result.filename() as file_name,result.filepath(1) as year,result.filepath(2) as month,result.filepath() as file_path,count(*) as records
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.*',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where result.filepath(1)=2020 and result.filepath(2) in('06','07','08')
group by result.filename(),result.filepath(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
order by result.filename() desc,result.filepath(1) desc,result.filepath(2) desc,result.filepath() desc
;
--reading data using filepath and filename
SELECT 
    top 10 *,result.filename() as file_name,result.filepath() as year
    from
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.*',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--checking datatype 
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    top 5 *  
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_data_green_csv/**'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]'
